name: COVID19ICD10PCSValueSetForAutomaticImplantableCardioverterDefibrillatorProcedure
title: COVID19 ICD10PCS Value Set for Automatic Implantable Cardioverter/Defibrillator Procedure
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to automatic implantable cardioverter/defibrillator procedures and is listed as a cardiovascular disease on the CDC SARS-CoV-2 hospitalization surveillance case report form.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes cardioverter-defibrillator procedures. It includes insertion and replacement of cardioverter-defibrillator components.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes removal without replacement procedures.)
